reviewText: this movie is great i loved it you have to watch it so many times cause its so funny a must for any collecter it leaves you mouth watering for the last 3 videos and you really have to pay attention or youll miss the bast  part

trust me when i say i have no tolerance for Anime, the story almost always sucks and the writers expect the cutesy fad-animation style to cover it up. but this movie and its sequel are an exception, killer story, real  characters, and it kept me on the edge of my seat. rent it, buy it,  whaterver.
